about_the_game:
A strategic Turn-Based Battle Experience

●Gamble with your armor. Seize the moment when your foes falter and take them down.

●Unique character mechanisms. Unique characters with unique skills and attributes. Use their strength to overcome the challenge.

●Diverse and formidable enemies. Covert Operatives from the United Curtain,Transcendent entities from the Realms of Exoncept, and those unnamed horrors...Each type of enemy has its own distinctive traits. Survive, adapt, win.

●Abundant battlegrounds. With over a hundred battlefields in different styles, every encounter is fresh and unique.

Vast Possibilities for Your Team

●Extensive Equipment and Crafting System. Hundreds of items, weapons, varied crafting paths let you tailor your team's battle style according to their strength.

●Explore attributes and skill trees. With ample attribute and skill points for each character, you can freely explore different combat possibilities.

●Select diverse characters to build your squad. Each character has unique skills and mechanics. Choose the right one for the quest and flexibly tackle challenges.

Follow the Main Story through the Sun and Rain of the Hidden World

●Explore the secret world beyond the veil. From the Spiral Tower and the Mountain's Veil. to the Veiled Association and the alien world of Orcania, follow your journey to uncover their mysteries.

●Meet lovely, charming or striking companions. Meet androids, adorable, dashing, charming beastfolk, and more. Get to know each other as you travel together.

●Uncover the truth behind the transformation. Expose the conspiracy of the United Curtain, piece together the truth behind the transformation, bring a new dawn to a twisted, hidden world.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win10
  • Processor: Core Intel i5 CPU @ 2GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce MX330/750TI
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Need 64-bit Windows OS
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win10
  • Processor: Core Intel i7 CPU Comet Lake or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Need 64-bit Windows OS

short_description: Escape from the research facility and fight side by side with adorable android and therian companions against the dark side of the hidden society, and even the horrors that reason cannot contain. Set off change, uncover the truth of therian transformation, and bring a new dawn to the hidden world.
